title: Dinnerbone：今日有"c"快照
author: BensonQC
txt_content:
本帖最后由 _Benson_ 于 2014-7-24 21:55 编辑 



Dinnerbone:We're working on getting a 'c' snapshot out today with some crash fixes and more optimizations for people with older computers.
Dinnerbone:我们正在制作今日将发布的"c"快照，包括一些碰撞修复和为拥有旧电脑的人们的更多优化。

坐等Minecraft 14w30c发布。

replies.txt_content: 期待ing
